en.title: Take name
en.prompt: My baby will be born in June 2023. The father's last name is Li and the mother's last name is Hou. Can you help us choose a beautiful, auspicious, wise, and virtuous name for our child? Please derive the name from the Bible.
en.remark: Select a name for your child that carries a meaningful and beautiful significance, drawing inspiration from classical literature.

metaDescription: Naming a baby? Find beautiful, auspicious names derived from the Bible. Select names with meaningful spiritual significance.
